scripts.clean: npm run clean:bs && npm run clean:server
scripts.prepare-examples: mkdir -p cypress/server/public/basic && mkdir -p cypress/server/public/form && mkdir -p cypress/server/public/request && cp examples/*.html cypress/server/public/basic && cp examples/*.html cypress/server/public/request  && cp examples/*.html cypress/server/public/form
scripts.build-examples: fpack examples/Basic.bs.js --output=cypress/server/public/basic && fpack examples/Request.bs.js --output=cypress/server/public/request && fpack examples/Request.bs.js --output=cypress/server/public/request && fpack examples/Form.bs.js --output=cypress/server/public/form
scripts.ci: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run build-examples && npm run prepare-examples
